pinyin: shou3 zhu1 dai4 tu4 , yuan2 mu4 qiu2 yu2

definition: abbr. for 守株待兔，緣木求魚|守株待兔，缘木求鱼[shou3 zhu1 dai4 tu4 , yuan2 mu4 qiu2 yu2]

sentences.english: Fresh weight increases slowly. Correlation analysis indicates there is…
sentences.chinese: 相關分析表明，全鉀含量與株高成正相關。

sentences.english: They have also bred 200,000 toxin-free fruit tree nurseries.
sentences.chinese: 他們還培育無毒果樹苗木二十萬株。

sentences.english: Results 21 strains of Sporothrix schenckii were isolated and i dentified.
sentences.chinese: 結果共分離出21株申克孢子絲菌。

sentences.english: Ovary culture of hybrid embryos was used at early phase and 128 seedlings were obtained successfully.
sentences.chinese: 通過對早期雜種胚胎的子房培養，獲得128株小苗。

sentences.english: We isolated 101 strains of Clostridium difficile from feces of patients and hamsters.
sentences.chinese: 我們從病人糞便和地鼠糞中分離出難辨梭菌101株。

sentences.english: The fourth category has 32 plants of Cinnamomum camphora as the second grade national key protective plants.
sentences.chinese: 第四類有二級國家重點保護野生樹種樟樹32株。

sentences.english: Irrigating water quota has a remarkable effect on leaf area and plant height.
sentences.chinese: 灌水定額對夏玉米葉面積和株高有顯著影響。

sentences.english: There were difference in resistance by inoculation with different strains of Aspergillus flavus.
sentences.chinese: 不同致病菌株接種，抗性反應有差異。
未發現萬古黴素耐藥株。

sentences.english: The inheritance of plant was characterized as overdominance;
sentences.chinese: 株高的遺傳爲超顯性遺傳。

sentences.english: Some crown galls strains changed properties many months after induction.
sentences.chinese: 在誘發後數月內有些冠癭株發生明顯變化。

sentences.english: However, the resistance of standard strain to minimum bactericidal concentration of iodophor was slightly higher than that of clinically isolated strains.
sentences.chinese: 但標準株對碘伏最小殺菌濃度略高於臨牀分離株。

sentences.english: However, the resistance of standard strain to minimum bactericidal concentration of iodophor was slightly higher than that of clinically isolated strains.
sentences.chinese: 但標準株對碘伏最小殺菌濃度略高於臨牀分離株。

sentences.english: Narrow heritabilities of rows per ear and plant height are higer than 50%.
sentences.chinese: 穗行數和株高的狹義遺傳力超過了50%。

sentences.english: Hybridization is also used for the improvement of yeast strains.
sentences.chinese: 雜交技術也被用於改良酵母菌株。

sentences.english: Based on immunity determination, the 19 strains tested were divided into two groups.
sentences.chinese: 根據兩種免疫模型的測定，將19株鼻疽菌分爲兩羣。

definition: classifier for trees, cabbages, plants etc
tree, esp. with recognizable trunk (as opposed to 灌木[guan4 mu4], bush or shrub)
Catalpa bungei or Manchurian Catalpa, a tea plant
